attributes.action: Change the financial system for UK Government! No Money Problems For Them!
attributes.additional_details:
The UK government spent £800 Billion in 2018 on public services and when this figure is divided into the population of roughly 70 million people it gives us a figure of around £15,000. With this money 
1. They can't top up pensioners minimum salary to a figure of £50,000 a year, 
2. Can't invest 10 times more into the National Health Service
3. Make Higher Education Free
4. Contribute to the Minimum wage and make it around £30 per hour to get everyone out of poverty.
5. Tackle the Housing Crises
attributes.background:
https://helptheworld.live 
https://youtu.be/OaHQKbpLNDE
Change the Financial System For The UK Government so it can have as much money as it wants from it's Central Bank as a grant and does not need to borrow or tax any more. Please watch the video to the end as the beginning is a bit slow paced

rejection.details: We're not sure exactly how you'd like the Government or Parliament to change the financial system. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.
